column1: As we commemorate #NativeAmericanHertiageDay we take the time to learn and grow from our deep history and rightfully honor the culture of Native American tribes across the country.
While there may be less people at the table this Thanksgiving it will ensure we can enjoy future holidays with our loved ones. Stay safe and healthy and have a wonderful Thanksgiving.

We're seeing the number of COVID cases increase & it's important to remember simple steps we can take to stay healthy: Wash your hands avoid touching your face stay home if you are sick & get tested & please wear a mask. We'll get through this but only if we do it together.
